expectHKDays = #{expectHKDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tradeAddPrice = #{tradeAddPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weightedPrice = #{weightedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tsu = current_timestamp,
